name: 'Sonic Boom Six' - CD Album
description:
Format : CD
Catalogue # : XMR062CD
Release Date : 15th October 2012

Manchester’s SONIC BOOM SIX can now FINALLY announce the release of the superb, game changing, perception challenging, new, self titled album, ‘Sonic Boom Six’, for their brand new label, Xtra Mile Recordings, on October 15th.
 
Produced and mixed by Peter Miles (Futures, We Are The Ocean, The King Blues), ‘Sonic Boom Six’ builds on the band's previous reputation for progressive, genre-hopping punk rock, by adding contemporary electronica, crushing rock riffs, huge vocal hooks and anthemic song-writing to the mix. It’s a HUGE step forward in every aspect for the band, and one that will rightfully establish them as one of the most exciting new/old prospects in the UK. ‘Sonic Boom Six’ also features the vocal talents of SB6 friends and allies Jim Sorrow (ex-Freaks Union) Kat Marsh (Lionface, ex-The King Blues), Mike Attack (Rat Attack) and the debut recorded performance of Kerrang! 105.2 DJ Matt Stocks, as the emergency radio broadcaster on ‘S.O.S (State of Shock)’.

TRACKLISTING

1.    For the Kids of the Multiculture
2.    Virus
3.    Karma is a Bitch
4.    S.O.S (State of Shock)
5.    Gary Got a Gun
6.    The High Cost of Living
7.    Who Will Survive (and What Will be Left of Them?)
8.    Keep on Believing
9.    Flatline
10.  Karma is a Lady

For any queries, please email rebelalliancerecordings@googlemail.com

Please allow 10 days for delivery. International orders can be longer.

When making a purchase, please add rebelalliancerecordings@googlemail.com to your email contacts. We will send you updates once your order has been dispatched, but you may not see them if they go to your junk/trash folder in your email.

name: City of Thieves - CD Album (2011 Version w Bonus Tracks)
description:
'CITY OF THIEVES'. 

1. Welcome to the (City of Thieves). 
2. Back 2 Skool. 
3. The Road to Hell is Paved with Good Inventions. 
4. Bang Bang Bang Bang! 
5. A Bright Cold Day in April. 
6. Rum Little Skallywag. 
7. The Concrete We're Trapped Within (It's Yours). 
8. Strange Transformations. 
9. Through the Eyes of a Child. 
10. Polished Chrome and Open Kitchens. 
11. Jericho. 
12. Floating Away.

NOW WITH BONUS TRACKS...

13. Nine Stitches
14. The Dangers Of Rock n Roll
15. This Is Real
16. Bang, Bang, Bang, Bang! (Midas Mix)

Manchester’s Sonic Boom Six return with their third album City of Thieves, the fifth record to be released on their own Rebel Alliance Recordings.

Whilst SB6’s eclectic punk soundclash staunchly remains far too down-to-earth to ever being described as ‘prog’, the album follows the concept of a collection of songs that explore and examine life in a large UK city. From crass consumerism to traffic congestion, lawless youth culture to homelessness, binge drinking to street violence, Laila and the guys cast their pragmatic critique on the state of the nation, embellished by their characteristic positivity and humour.

City of Thieves is built on the bedrock of the band’s unique ska-core/hip-hop/jungle hybrid but (in keeping with their original ethos of expanding the boundaries of what a punk band can be) adds dubstep, electro, dub and even glam rock to the mix, all the while retaining the snarling live edge honed by recent tours of the UK, Europe and the US with acts such as Reel Big Fish, Less Than Jake, Bad Brains and Big D and the Kid’s Table. The first class collaborators involved in the record include production duties by Peter Miles (The King Blues, The Steal), artwork courtesy of Dan Mumford (Gallows, ADTR) and guest appearances from Al Rumjen (King Prawn, ADF), Robin Leitch (Random Hand), and more!

Price is £10 plus postage and packaging.

name: Rude Awakening CD complilation
description:
Now available. The CD version of our Rude Awakening compilation!

Sonic Boom Six’s latest release RUDE AWAKENING is a celebration of the story so far. With 17 songs culled from across their back catalogue, it’s the perfect introduction to SB6. RUDE AWAKENING includes the Boom favourites 'Piggy in  The Middle' 'Sound of a Revolution' and 'Monkey See, Monkey Do', their latest video for 'The Road To Hell Is Paved With Good Inventions' and a brand-new recording of their incendiary cover of Puretone's 'Addicted To Bass'.

1. Bigger Than Punk Rock 
2. The Concrete We're Trapped Within (It's Yours)
3. Meanwhile, Back In The Real World... 
4. Blood For Oil 
5. Strange Transformations
6. Piggy In The Middle
7. Marching Round In Circles 
8. Northern Skies 
9. Sound Of A Revolution 
10. Back 2 Skool
11. Monkey See, Monkey Do
12. September To May
13. The Road To Hell Is Paved With Good Inventions

15. An Ode To DIY Promoters
16. The Rape Of Punk To Come
17. Addicted to Bass

Sound of a Revolution (video)

Sonic Boom Six's first vinyl release in the UK! Strictly limited to 500 numbered copies, the album is released alongside the April 2010 tour and serves as a celebration of SB6's music so far. Containing the band's favourite twelve songs to play live 'Rude Awakening' is a collector's item in the making.

name: PLAY ON: Rare, Rejected and Arcade Perfected DOUBLE CD Album
description:
Sonic Boom Six return with a double-CD package of rarities and remixes. On the first CD we have Arcade Perfected… the entire album of Arcade Perfect completely remixed in all kinda stylee from Dub to Drum n Bass to Dubstep to Plonkelectro(!) from the likes of our very own Ben Boom, Tim G, DJ Sonar, High Rankin, DJ BC, Dan from Skindred and much more. The second disc is chockfull of rarities, demos, live sessions and unreleased tunes. We’ve really scraped the plate to find stuff that fits the standard of the first disc and have included lots of good stuff like the infamous ‘lost song’ ‘We Wanna War’ and some things never heard before by anyone, anywhere.

DISC 1:

Arcade Perfected:

1) Sound of Revolutionization (Ben Boom Mix)
2) While New Were Sleeping (Halcyon Myth Mix)
3) Ya Dubsta! (Tim G Remix)
4) I Changed I could Smile (Ben Boom Mix)
5) Arcade Perfected (Ben Boom Mix)
6) Meanwhile, Back in the Other World (High Rankin Mix)
7) For 12 Weeks, the City is Different (DJ Sonar & Ben Boom Mix)
8) Tell Me Something I Dub know (DJ BC Mix)
9) Flowered (Forbidden Planet Remix)
10) The Strange Mix of Sid the Strangler (Dan Skindred Mix)
11) For 12 Weeks, the City is Sleeping (Project Serendipity Mix)
12) September to Maybe (Ben Boom Mix)

DISC 2:

Outakes, live tunes and B-sides.

Rare and Rejected:

1) Play On
2) Marching Round in Circles
3) We Wanna War
4) Devil Made Me Do It
5) Boy Meets Girl
6) Setting Sun
7) Found It, Burned It, Fucked Off
8) Cuckold
9) 3 Minute Hero
10) Sticks and Stones
11) The World's a Twisted Place, But it won't twist me
12) Face Forward

name: Sonic Boom Six 2011 Singles Collection
description:
This is your chance to get all of Sonic Boom Six's 2011 releases in one attractive multidisc package. 2011 was a year of re-invention for 'The Boom' and across these singles you can take the journey across this pivotal year with them. Start at the dancefloor explosion of 'New Style Rocka' through to the summer festivals with 'Sunny Side of the Street' and finally to the forthcoming album's incendiary opening salvo 'For The Kids Of The Multiculture'. If 2012 is set to be the year of The Boom, then it was ignited by this little box of bangers.

DISC 1

1) New Style Rocka feat. Tonn Piper
2) What Doesn't Kill You Make You Stronger
3) New Style Rocka (Frisk remix)

DISC 2

1) Sunny Side of the Street
2) Sunny Side of the Street (Sonic Scribe Remix)
3) Sunny Side of the Street (Demo)

DISC 3

1) For The Kids Of The Multiculture
2) Five Minutes With You
3) Sunny Side of the Street (Live at Hevy Fest)

name: Ruff and Ready SB6 Live in Manchester DVD
description:
Recorded by Sitcom Soldiers on the last date of the Ruff and Ready tour in Manchester. Wicked hometown gig with a jolly stage invasion and all that good stuff. Itch from the King Blues turns up on All-In and Wind Ya Batty, Laila is suitably foul-mouthed and the crowd is nice and bonkers!

This DVD also has a photo gallery, a cool 'Northern Skies' remix and the All-In video.

Track listing

   1. Do It Today
   2. Blood For Oil
   3. Bigger than Punk Rock
   4. Monkey See Monkey Do
   5. Piggy in the Middle
   6. A People’s History of the Future
   7. Northern Skies
   8. Marching Round in Circles
   9. All-In
  10. Wind ya Batty
  11. Danger! Danger!
  12. The Rape of Punk to Come
  13. The Mighty Mighty Boom (encore)

Preview here:

name: Sonic Boom Six Boom or Bust Live in Manchester DVD
description: The live DVD of the Manchester leg of the Boom or Bust tour 2009. The DVD features a 5 camera shoot by Sitcom Soldiers and a 24-track sound recording by our resident soundman, Hubert Mathias. Also included is a bonus mini-documentary 'SB6 across Europe' directed and created by Ben C during our 2009 European tour with Random Hand in tow. Tracklist The Concrete We're Trapped Within (It's Yours) Back 2 Skool Bigger Than Punk Rock Strange Transformations Danger! Danger! People Acklike They Don't Know Sound of a Revolution Through The Eyes of a Child An Ode To DIY Promoters A Bright Cold Day in April Bang! Bang! Bang! Bang! Polished Chrome & Open Kitchens Meanwhile... Back in the Real World Piggy in the Middle ------------------------------------------------------- Floating Away SB6 Monkey See, Monkey Do Rasputin Also includes bonus tour documentary 'SB6 across Europe'.
